meanings.definition: A unit of measure for the purity of gold
meanings.sent1: She bought a necklace with 18 karats of gold.
meanings.sent2: The ring was stamped with 14 karats to indicate its purity.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure chest was full of fake karats, fooling everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as 24 karats of gold.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the karats in the jewelry store, dazzling customers.

meanings.definition: A measure of the fineness of gold, equal to 24 parts of pure gold in 24 parts of the alloy
meanings.sent1: The jeweler explained that 22 karats gold is softer than 24 karats.
meanings.sent2: The pendant was made of 18 karats gold, giving it a warm hue.
meanings.sent3: The karats in the gold coin seemed to wink at him mischievously.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was worth more than all the karats in the world.
meanings.sent5: The karats in the bracelet gleamed like tiny stars on her wrist.
